function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Travel-related infections biasing estimates","Impact":"Overestimation of disease spread and transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing broader testing and surveillance beyond travelers from specific locations","Technologies":"Real-time human mobility data analysis","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Opportunity for onward transmission at destination","Impact":"Increased risk of local transmission and community spread","Mitigation":"Enhanced active surveillance and reduced confirmation interval","Technologies":"Real-time surveillance systems, contact tracing technology","People":"Local health authorities, community leaders","Owner":"Local health departments, disease control agencies"},{"Description":"Uncertain observation of infection events","Impact":"Difficulty in estimating and predicting disease spread","Mitigation":"Using detailed exposure and travel data, analyzing human mobility patterns","Technologies":"Data analytics, real-time human mobility data analysis","People":"Epidemiologists, disease researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
